meta.title: Slotty - Availability Calendar for Freelancers
meta.description: Stop chasing clients. Let them book you. Share your availability calendar, receive booking requests, approve with one click.

hero.subheadline: Share your availability calendar, receive booking requests, and approve with one click. Built for freelancers who value their time.

features.subheadline: Built specifically for freelancers, photographers, consultants, and anyone who manages their own schedule.

calendar.title: Public Calendar
calendar.desc: Share a beautiful, branded calendar with your clients. They see your real-time availability without back-and-forth emails.

booking.title: Booking Requests
booking.desc: Clients request dates, you approve or decline. Stay in control of your schedule while making it easy for clients to book.

multiday.title: Multi-Day Bookings
multiday.desc: Accept date ranges for longer projects, events, or multi-day shoots. Perfect for photographers and event planners.

branding.title: Custom Branding
branding.desc: Add your logo, customize colors, and make the calendar your own. Present a professional image to every client.

notifications.title: Email Notifications
notifications.desc: Get notified instantly when someone requests a booking. Never miss an opportunity again.

doubleBooking.title: No Double-Booking
doubleBooking.desc: Smart availability management ensures you never accidentally double-book. Your calendar stays accurate and reliable.

how.subheadline: From sign-up to your first booking in under 5 minutes. No complicated setup required.

step1.title: Create Your Calendar
step1.desc: Sign up and set up your availability calendar in seconds. Add your branding and customize the look.

step2.title: Share Your Link
step2.desc: Get a unique public link to your calendar. Share it on your website, social media, or send directly to clients.

step3.title: Get Booked
step3.desc: Clients request dates, you approve with one click. Your calendar updates automatically. That's it!

comparison.subheadline: See how Slotty transforms the way you manage bookings.

pricing.subheadline: Start free, upgrade when you need more. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.

cta.subheadline: Join hundreds of freelancers who have simplified their booking process. Start for free, no credit card required.

footer.tagline: The simplest way for freelancers to manage their availability and get booked by clients.

setup.title: Setup Your Calendar
setup.subtitle: Let's configure your booking system in just a few steps

mode.title: Choose Your Booking Mode
mode.description: Select how clients will book with you. This is an architectural choice that affects your entire calendar experience.

warning.title: Important: This cannot be changed later
warning.description: Once you complete setup, your booking mode is permanent. Choose carefully based on how you work with clients.

fullDay.title: Full Day Booking
fullDay.description: Clients book entire days or date ranges. No time slots, no hourly scheduling - just simple day-based availability.
fullDay.ideal: Ideal for: Photographers, event planners, consultants with day-rate pricing

timeSlots.title: Time Slot Booking
timeSlots.description: Clients book specific time slots within your available hours. Full control over your schedule with hourly precision.
timeSlots.ideal: Ideal for: Coaches, therapists, tutors, service providers with hourly rates

schedule.title: Set Your Weekly Schedule
schedule.description: Define your default working hours for each day of the week.
schedule.noBlocks: Add time blocks to set your availability

slots.title: Configure Slot Settings
slots.description: Fine-tune how your time slots work.

duration.title: Slot Duration
duration.description: How long is each booking slot?

advance.title: Advance Booking
advance.description: How far in advance can clients book?

notice.title: Minimum Notice
notice.description: Minimum hours before a slot can be booked

branding.title: Brand Your Calendar
branding.description: Personalize how your calendar appears to clients.

name.label: Calendar Name
name.hint: This appears at the top of your public calendar

tagline.label: Tagline
tagline.placeholder: e.g., Professional photography for special moments
tagline.hint: A short description of your services (optional)

heroText.label: Welcome Message
heroText.placeholder: e.g., Book a session with me! I specialize in portraits and events...
heroText.hint: A longer description shown on your booking page (optional)

review.title: Review & Launch
review.description: Review your settings before launching your calendar.
review.readyDescription: Your calendar is configured and ready for clients.

dashboardPage.title: Dashboard
dashboardPage.welcome: Here's an overview of your bookings and activity

recentBookings.title: Recent Bookings
recentBookings.empty: No bookings yet. When clients request bookings, they will appear here.

upcomingBookings.title: Upcoming
upcomingBookings.empty: No upcoming bookings. Approved bookings will appear here.

upgrade.title: Upgrade to Pro
upgrade.description: Unlock unlimited bookings and premium features

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences

profile.title: Profile Information
profile.name: Name
profile.timezoneHint: Your calendar times will be displayed in this timezone

password.title: Change Password
password.description: Update your password to keep your account secure

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

dialog.title: Are you sure?
dialog.description: This will permanently delete your account and all your data. This action cannot be undone.

billing.title: Billing
billing.description: Manage your subscription and billing details
billing.currentPlanDescription: Your current subscription plan and usage

success.title: Subscription Activated!
success.description: Your subscription has been activated successfully. Enjoy your new features!

cancelled.title: Checkout Cancelled
cancelled.description: Your checkout was cancelled. You can try again anytime.

actions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this booking? This action cannot be undone.

empty.title: No bookings yet
empty.description: When clients request bookings, they will appear here.

calendar.title: Availability
calendar.description: Configure your working hours and availability

schedule.title: Weekly Schedule
schedule.description: Set your default working hours for each day of the week

overrides.title: Date Overrides
overrides.description: Set special availability for specific dates

customers.title: Customers
customers.description: View your customers and their booking history
customers.search: Search by name, email or phone...

empty.title: No customers yet
empty.description: When clients request bookings, they will appear here.

createDialog.title: Create Public Link
createDialog.description: Create a new public link to share your calendar
createDialog.name: Link name (optional)

empty.title: No public links yet
empty.description: Create a link to share your calendar publicly

social.title: Social Image
social.description: Generate calendar images for social media

mobileModal.instruction: Press and hold the image, then select "Save Image"
